content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist from XYZ Home Services. I see you might need some plumbing assistance. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Mike. Could you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Thanks for that. Let me verify if we service your area.
Good news, Mike! We do service your area. When would be the ideal time for a plumber to visit you?
Honestly, I'm really busy all this month and canâ€™t fit anything in right now.

I understand, Mike. It sounds like this month is a hectic time for you. If it's okay, I can keep your information on file and check back later when you're more available. Would you like me to do that?
Yes, that would be great. Thanks for understanding.
You're welcome, Mike. I will mark this conversation as declined for now due to your current schedule. When you're ready, just reach out and we can arrange your appointment. Have a great day!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule appointment
